document.full_text: niger has confirmed a deal with libya's lap green network for a ten-year majority share in state telecommunications firm sonitel and its mobile arm, sahel com, according to a government statement.
document.title: niger signs off on libyan deal for state telecom firm
lines_and_colors: niger has confirmed a deal with libya's lap green network for a ten-year majority share in state telecommunications firm sonitel and its mobile arm, sahel com, according to a government statement.
